comment: Weber is one of the nicest professors I've ever had. I'm pursuing a minor in Italian Studies and she has gone far beyond my expectations to help me out! Glad I get to take ITAL 2001 (online) with her next semester.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Clear grading criteria--Hilarious

comment: Professor Weber was an amazing Italian professor. I went from barely being able to get a good grade in Italian 1101 to being nearly fluent by the end of this semester. I really can't recommend this professor enough.
